name: *MARCEUSE-XMDðŸ˜ˆ
description: WhatsApp bot developed by Kingston Tech

PREFIX.description: Choose the prefix for your bot commands (e.g., '#').

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Enable automatic reading of contact statuses ('yes' to activate, 'no' to deactivate).

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Enable automatic downloading and sending of contact statuses ('yes' to activate, 'no' to deactivate).

PM_PERMIT.description: Restrict other users from using the bot in private messages ('yes' to activate, 'no' to deactivate).

BOT_NAME.description: Enter a name for your bot.

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: Provide one or more URLs for the bot menu (e.g., 'url1,url2,url3').

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Set the bot to public mode ('yes') or private mode ('no').

SESSION_ID.description: Enter the session ID received after scanning the QR code.

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Enter your phone number with country code (e.g., '228' for Togo, without '+').

WARN_COUNT.description: Set the warning limit for warning commands.

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: Enable the bot startup message ('yes' to enable, 'no' to disable).

PRESENCE.description: Set presence status: '1' for always online, '2' for typing, '3' for recording audio, or leave blank for real status.

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: Enable anti-delete message feature ('yes' to enable, 'no' to disable).
